attributes.action: Make St Georges day a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is St Georges day not a bank holiday? St patricks day is a bank holiday in Ireland. St Andrews is a public holiday on Scotland. As an Englishman i am very proud of where i come from and the great country that is England. Surely we should be given 1 day of the year to celebrate our great country. This has been raised before but seems to be shrugged off by the government why? Nobody knows.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
